name: 'Queer As Folk' : Emmett Trivia Quiz | Queer As Folk | 15 Questions

questions.text: What town in Mississippi is Emmett from?
questions.explanation:
Hazelhurst & Hazlehurst.

	You've heard him start stories with, "When I was growing up in Hazelhurst, Mississippi..."!

questions.text: What product does George's (Emmett's older boyfriend) company make?
questions.explanation:
Pickles.

	George Shickel - Shickel's Pickles! Poor George died during an intimate moment with Emmett, from a heart attack on an airplane.

questions.text: Who did Emmett start a relationship with at the beginning of season 3?
questions.explanation:
Ted.

	Ted realized he was in love with Emmett and told him, and Emmett at first was not interested, but then realized that he loved Ted back.

questions.text: What is the name Emmett uses on Ted's website?
questions.explanation:
Fetch Dixon.

	Ted told him to take the name of a childhood pet and the street he lived on growing up to make his Internet name, and Emmett came up with Fetch Dixon.

questions.text: Why did Emmett try to become straight during the first season?
options: He was fed up with being rejected
His mother threatened to disown him
He almost died of a drug overdose and wanted to leave this lifestyle
questions.explanation:
He promised God.

	During an HIV scare, Emmett promised God that he would never sleep with another man again as long as he did not have HIV. It did not last.

questions.text: Before getting a job on the website, what was Emmett's job?
questions.explanation:
Clothing salesman.

	A self-described 'couturier to disco-trash'. He worked at a store on Liberty Avenue called Torso.

questions.text: Peter Paige is straight in real life.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Peter Paige, Randy Harrison (Justin), and Robert Gant (Ben), are the gay members of the cast.

questions.text: What did Emmett dress up as for Ben's birthday party?
When Emmett inherited $1 million in George's will, what did he buy for Brian?
questions.explanation:
Armani's entire collection.

	He bought the Armani for Brian, lifetime Opera seats for Ted, a trip to Europe for Justin, full payment on Michael's comic book store, a new SUV for Lindsay and Melanie, and a diamond tennis bracelet for Debbie.

questions.text: What is the name of the woman Emmett slept with when he was trying to turn straight?
Whose hand did Emmett hold for an hour, before telling anyone that that person was dead?
questions.explanation:
His Grandmother.

	When Ted was in his coma, Michael and Emmett found a secret shrine to Michael in Ted's apartment. They realized there was a lot they didn't know about their friends. Michael revealed that he didn't know who his father was, and Emmett revealed the story about his grandmother.

questions.text: Who was Emmett's roommate in seasons 1 and 2?
questions.explanation:
Michael.

	Emmett and Michael lived together since a hooker burned down Emmett's apartment building several years ago, save for the several months when Michael lived with David in Portland. He recently moved in with Ted.

questions.text: Who is Emmett speaking to: "If you break his heart, I'll break your face"?
questions.explanation:
Blake.

	He is worried that Blake will hurt Ted. This shows Emmett's true compassion and unconditional love for his friends, especially his best friend.
